PassiveDesc.Name: Bloodbath
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, gain one of the following Abnormality Pages: Blood, Scars, or Pale Hands.

PassiveDesc.Name: Auspicious Auspices
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, gain Trepidation for the Scene. At the end of each Scene, gain Fragile equal to current Fragile.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scorched Girl
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, gain one of the following Abnormality Pages: Ashes, Footfalls, or Matchlight.

PassiveDesc.Name: Last Match Flame
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever an ally dies, all enemies are purged of Burn and recover 50% of max HP. At the end of each Scene, if there are no allies, die.

PassiveDesc.Name: Forsaken Murderer
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, gain one of the following Abnormality Pages: Metallic Ringing, Chained Wrath, or Violence.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gratuitous Rebound
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon winning a clash, take damage equal to the roll value. After dealing damage with dice, take damage equal to damage dealt.

PassiveDesc.Name: Today's Shy Look
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice roll lower and lose Power when the current face is happy. Dice roll higher and gain Power when the current face is angry. Upon winning a clash, the current face becomes happier. Upon losing a clash, the current face becomes angrier. At the start of the Act, gain one of the following Abnormality Pages: Look of the Day, Social Distancing, or Shyness.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fragment of the Universe
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, gain one of the following Abnormality Pages: Echoes from the Beyond, Tentacles, or Incomprehensible.

PassiveDesc.Name: Enlightenment
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon losing a clash, take Stagger damage equal to 40% of max Stagger Resist and gain 1-2 Fragile.
